resources.string: Address not found\nIf you have already given location permission and set them on "always", try to restart the device.
Choose the way you like to authorize a remote ecoWatering Device.
Are you sure to detach this sensor?
The name you choose, will be used to recognize your hub.
Sorry, something went wrong, please try again.
You won\'t be able to change it
If you want to use this irrigation system go to Next.\n\nIf you cannot see your irrigation system, please make you sure irrigation system is correctly connected and retry.
No irrigation system founded.\n\nIf you cannot see your irrigation system, please make you sure irrigation system is correctly connected and retry.
Now you can use that remote device to control your ecoWatering system.
Please restart the authorization process on the remote device.
Sorry, this device is not available

Choose the way you like to authorize a new remote device
Wait a moment. We\'re try to connect…
You have to allow the app, to know your location
Go to Setting->Privacy->Manage permissions and allow the app to know your location manually.
We need to know your position
Please grant location permission.\nWe will use your location, to allow the app to generate a consistently plane for your system, based on weather.
Please grant location permission manually.\nWe will use your location, to allow the app to generate a consistently plane for your system, based on weather.
We will use your Bluetooth to allow you, to be paired with the ecoWatering Hub only.
We will use your location, to allow the app to generate a consistently plane for your system, based on weather.
Go to Setting->privacy->Manage permissions and allow the app to know your location manually.
We will use your location, to be sure you are near to the ecoWatering Hub.
